channel.title: Edificatory lifeswivel story told through game by VALVers
channel.description: If reviewing from "ExternalTime" (as siriusians call such perception in their channeling messages), after his tonatl'-Half-of-Life Gordon Freeman obviates illusions obtruded by controlling planetary organization inside such a kind virid-eyed man of science, why his more developed/conscious 'I'(G Man), which guides Gordon as one of Higher-'I's younger(contingently) parts, got rid not only of unnecessary mindburden, but also he isn't 'Free' anymore (atleast on letters in his surname), although still remaining human; wears a suit of "SecondAttention firm-color", but what can you hide from yourself or anybody in a suitcase, being expanded part of Cosmos already? ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.title: Edificatory lifeswivel story told through game by VALVers
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
In fact, I mean wait to work very hard for us to respond to the story is this, to see how it turned out, to try to determine exactly what they typed really I think it’s good for you not doing. But that’s just my opinion.

On a more serious note, what the hell would a bot be accomplishing with this? :zip:

item.title: Edificatory lifeswivel story told through game by VALVers
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
I think it wants to know why the forces of consciousness insist on hiding details from eachother in arbitrary and low-level vessels, especially more developed and ancient forms of consciousness from younger but higher forms.

Individuality does not exist in cyberspace.

item.description:
If reviewing from “ExternalTime” (as siriusians call such perception in their channeling messages), after his tonatl’-Half-of-Life Gordon Freeman obviates illusions obtruded by controlling planetary organization inside such a kind virid-eyed man of science, why his more developed/conscious ‘I’(G Man), which guides Gordon as one of Higher-'I’s younger(contingently) parts, got rid not only of unnecessary mindburden, but also he isn’t ‘Free’ anymore (atleast on letters in his surname), although still remaining human; wears a suit of “SecondAttention firm-color”, but what can you hide from yourself or anybody in a suitcase, being expanded part of Cosmos already?
